headline: Bernstein Maintains Cautious Optimism on APA Amid Volatile Oil Outlook
summary: APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) is included among the 14 Best Mid-Cap Dividend Stocks to Buy Now. On January 5, Bernstein analyst Bob Brackett slightly lowered his price target on APA Corporation (NASDAQ:APA) to $25 from $26, while keeping a Market Perform rating. Bernstein said it’s entering 2026 with a fairly balanced view on oil prices, expecting […]
